titleStmt.title: Articles of impeachment of transcendent crimes, injuries, misdemeanours, oppressions, and high breach of trust, committed by Col. Philip Jones: exhibited by Mr. Bledry Morgan; and read in Parliament, the 18th of May, 1659. Together with Col. Phillip Jones's answer thereunto.

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books).
Appears on UMI microfilm "Thomason Tracts" reel 146 (British Library copy) and on film "Early English books, 1641-1700" reel 805 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
